Dear Dr. Oberholtseri
1 hasten to answer your letter of April 22, Just received* As
you will see from the various items attached, the 7AI has recently
granted the BABB funds with which to consolidate Personnel-Placement
efforts for educational television and radio. The letter from Mr. Griffiths
to Mr* Mullen (dittoed copy attached) explains this dearly, I bdleve.
In a fav days you will be receiving from our Mr. Don Walker, who is in
charge of this service for us, and whom you may oontaet directly, ques¬
tionnaires to enable us to help you.
Meanwhile, the entire Stew Jersey staff is available aa will
be noted fro* the attached. This is the best source of personnel (of the
sort 1 think you need) that 1 know of at the moment, though 1 am asking
Mr* Walker to scrutinise all files as they come in, and try to help you
find the best possible candidates.
Incidentally may we circularise this position to prospective
candidates? Within the next few weeks Mr. Walker hopes to have job
analyses and descriptions available which will give us s better answer
than we now have to the statement of desirable qualifications for managers
and other positions. X shall see that you have the best thinking avail¬
able on this ss soon as it is available. A recent article in the AEBT
Journal, by Dr. Walter Emery, will be enclosed with this letter if we
still have a copy available. Otherwise a copy can be secured direct
from Dr. Emery at the JCET address in Washington.
